column1: '''''alda''''' is a noun meaning "tree" in [[Quenya]].<ref name="Names">{{App
column2: Letters}}, Note, ''The names of the letters''</ref>  The genitive plural is ''aldaron''.<ref>{{RGEO

left]]''Alda'' is also the name in Quenya of the twenty-eighth letter of the [[Tengwar]] alphabet.<ref name="Names"/>  In written Quenya ''Arda'' is used for '''LD'''.  In other modes this letter represents voiceless '''L''' (or '''LH''').<ref>{{App
column3: Letters}}, Note, ''The additional letters''</ref>  The Westron name for this letter is '''''Lhó'''''.<ref>See [[Westron Tengwar]]</ref>

column1: <!-- An extra blank line is inserted to prevent the Etymology section title from indenting -->
The word derives from the [[Primitive Quendian]] [[Sundocarme
